speech:
Here are some of the most interesting things that you can do during the lockdown in your home:
1. Learn a language 
2. Learn to play an instrument 
3. Write a novel
4. Get fit
5. Cook something new
6. Play a board game
7.Learn first aid
8.Discover your roots
9.Meditate
10.Improve your communication skills

1. Research volunteering opportunities in your city and mark down the most interesting ones. When the quarantines and isolation ends, we’ll still be in a pretty precarious situation. Making a personal contribution is the best way to show the world you care.
2. Keep a quarantine diary: it will be "fun" to read it again in a few years.
3. If you have a creative hobby like photography, painting, sculpture, writing, or graphic design, consider entering a competition.
4. Study. It’s now possible to take thousands of top-level courses online, completely free.
5. Help the poor and needy people in your locality.
6. Learn new languages which would be really helpful .
